author: Emily Fuchs (she/they)
title: Midterm 2 Sample Solutions
question:
SAMPLE solutions to Midterm 2 are now available at http://cs110.students.cs.ubc.ca/exams/2021w2-mt2/.
Please do not respond to these solutions with replies or posts in the form "the solution says X, if I did Y how many marks would I get." Instead, please treat these solutions as early feedback from which you can learn while the exam is still fresh in your mind.
